title: Johnny Baldwin
text:
Johnny Baldwin (born April 1, 1984) is a former professional <a href="Gridiron%20football">American and Canadian football</a> <a href="linebacker">linebacker</a>. He was drafted by the <a href="Detroit%20Lions">Detroit Lions</a> in the fifth round of the <a href="2007%20NFL%20Draft">2007 NFL Draft</a>. He played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> at <a href="Alabama%20Agricultural%20and%20Mechanical%20University">Alabama A&M</a>.
Baldwin was also a member of the <a href="Kansas%20City%20Chiefs">Kansas City Chiefs</a>, <a href="Washington%20Redskins">Washington Redskins</a>, <a href="Winnipeg%20Blue%20Bombers">Winnipeg Blue Bombers</a>, and <a href="California%20Redwoods">California Redwoods</a>.
Early years.
Baldwin attended <a href="McAdory%20High%20School">McAdory High School</a> in <a href="McCalla%2C%20Alabama">McCalla, Alabama</a> and was a student and a standout in <a href="High%20school%20football">football</a>. In football, he played linebacker and as a senior, he was an All-Area selection and an All-District selection.
